title: Helix Outriders
description: Promotional website for the Helix Outriders game concept (React + TypeScript).
longDescription: A promotional/landing website for the Helix Outriders game concept. Built to showcase the game’s vibe and key info in a clean, modern UI with responsive layout and polished sections. Deployed on Vercel.

title: Budget Website
description: Budget-focused web project deployed on Vercel.
longDescription: A budgeting-themed website project. Deployed on Vercel and written primarily in TypeScript with supporting CSS/HTML.

title: Wars Website
description: Web project with a hierachy system for club members to access news, book rooms and other features.
longDescription: This website was used for a club to inform memebers about upcoming events and news along with the ability to book rooms and tables. it was also built to accept new members and have a hierarchy system for the club members.

title: RESTful API for Endpoint Testing
description: REST API with Swagger UI docs, deployed on Render.
longDescription: A REST API project deployed on Render, with an interactive Swagger UI page for exploring and testing endpoints. Ideal for learning and demonstrating RESTful principles.

title: Tetris Flip
description: Retro Jam MCAST 2025 jam game: a 2.5D twist on classic Tetris with depth and dual-side play.
longDescription: Made for Retro Jam MCAST 2025 (28–30 November 2025). Tetris Flip reimagines classic Tetris in 2.5D where the shapes have depth, and the player must manage two sides of the tower. It’s a Windows release submitted for the jam, and built by a small team (design/programming + art + audio).

title: Personal Portfolio
description: My portfolio website with a projects section, sorting, and detail pages.
longDescription: A personal portfolio website deployed on Vercel. The repo is mainly TypeScript with CSS styling and some MDX/HTML. Built with a proper multi-page structure (projects list + project details + contact) and ongoing UI polish, including light-mode improvements.
